list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add css style. Si quelqu'un maitrise css qu'il s'amuse avec et l'ameliore le comme il veut

task.summary:
Refactor SQL queries and improve entity handling
Renamed table and column names in SQL queries to camelCase for consistency. Added generated key handling when creating entities (e.g., Person, Address, Bed) to ensure IDs are assigned appropriately. Removed unused compatibility checks and redundant methods, simplifying the codebase.
Update StayController to include CLI options menu

Update all dao th i have add cathc to try test des dao et ils marchent sauf bedDao pour l'instant. Changer de gender Male et Female par M et F pour faciliter l'entrer et le retour du de la bdd changement de socialsecurity de int a long

Refactor BedDao and update SQL queries for consistency
Updated SQL queries in BedDao to use camelCase for table and column names. Improved entity creation logic by handling generated keys correctly and streamlined attribute mappings. Added missing BedDao method call in Main.java to ensure completeness.

Refactor BedDao and update SQL queries for consistency
Updated SQL queries in BedDao to use camelCase for table and column names. Improved entity creation logic by handling generated keys correctly and streamlined attribute mappings. Added missing BedDao method call in Main.java to ensure completeness.

Add new DAOs, refactor models, and enhance SQL consistency
Introduced `KnowsDao` and `RestrictionRoomDao` to manage respective mappings for `Knows` and `RestrictionRoom` entities. Refactored several model classes (`RestrictionType`, `RestrictionRoom`, `Gender`) for improved naming clarity and added validation logic. Updated SQL queries across various DAOs (e.g., `StayDao`, `PersonDao`) to ensure attribute consistency, handle IDs correctly, and adopt camelCase conventions in queries and mapping.

Refactor controllers to use CLIView for user interaction
Replaced `Scanner` with the new `CLIView` class in `CLIController`, `PersonController`, and `StayController`. Centralized UI components into `CLIView`, enhancing modularity and code readability. Updated method signatures and flow to integrate the `CLIView` functionalities.

Refactor controllers to use CLIView for user interaction
Replaced `Scanner` with the new `CLIView` class in `CLIController`, `PersonController`, and `StayController`. Centralized UI components into `CLIView`, enhancing modularity and code readability. Updated method signatures and flow to integrate the `CLIView` functionalities.

Refactor controllers for improved error handling and modularity
Updated `PersonController` to include robust error handling for invalid age and gender inputs. Enhanced modularity by refactoring methods in `StayController` and integrating `CLIView` for user interactions. Deprecated unfinished features in `CLIController` with relevant error messages to improve user experience.

Fix bugs and improve data handling across services
Corrected logical errors in `StayController` and `PersonService` related to parameter ordering and comparisons. Enhanced `EligibilityService` and `StayService` with better restriction and assignment handling, including database integration via `RestrictionTypeDao` and new methods like `findByBedPerson` in `StayDao`. Added proper exception handling for improved robustness.

Convert application to JavaFX and fix key bugs.
Migrated the main application from CLI to JavaFX for better user experience by implementing `GuiView` and updating the main class. Fixed a critical bug in `PersonController` related to parameter ordering during person retrieval. Enhanced build files and dependencies, including JavaFX modules, PostgreSQL, and Maven plugins for JavaFX support.

Refactor to JavaFX and improve database handling.
Converted CLI to JavaFX for enhanced UI by adding FXML controllers and views. Updated database connection to use properties file and introduced modularized entity handling. Fixed minor bugs, improved structure by relocating CLI controllers, and streamlined dependency setup in `pom.xml`.

Add GUI for person management and implement update/delete logic
Introduced a JavaFX-based GUI with person-related fields and table view in `person_view.fxml`. Enhanced `PersonControllerFx` to handle person updates and deletions, including validation and clearing selections. Included new image assets for GUI design.

Add JavaFX-based GUI for person management
Introduced a new JavaFX GUI with FXML for managing persons, replacing the CLI interface. Added `styles/style.css` for consistent styling and improved the TableView layout to display person details. Enhanced `PersonControllerFx` to handle add, update, and delete operations with proper field bindings and validation.
Add css style. Si quelqu'un maitrise css qu'il s'amuse avec et l'ameliore le comme il veut

Renamed table and column names in SQL queries to camelCase for consistency. Added generated key handling when creating entities (e.g., Person, Address, Bed) to ensure IDs are assigned appropriately. Removed unused compatibility checks and redundant methods, simplifying the codebase.
Update StayController to include CLI options menu

Refactor BedDao and update SQL queries for consistency
Updated SQL queries in BedDao to use camelCase for table and column names. Improved entity creation logic by handling generated keys correctly and streamlined attribute mappings. Added missing BedDao method call in Main.java to ensure completeness.

Add new DAOs, refactor models, and enhance SQL consistency
Introduced `KnowsDao` and `RestrictionRoomDao` to manage respective mappings for `Knows` and `RestrictionRoom` entities. Refactored several model classes (`RestrictionType`, `RestrictionRoom`, `Gender`) for improved naming clarity and added validation logic. Updated SQL queries across various DAOs (e.g., `StayDao`, `PersonDao`) to ensure attribute consistency, handle IDs correctly, and adopt camelCase conventions in queries and mapping.

Refactor controllers to use CLIView for user interaction
Replaced `Scanner` with the new `CLIView` class in `CLIController`, `PersonController`, and `StayController`. Centralized UI components into `CLIView`, enhancing modularity and code readability. Updated method signatures and flow to integrate the `CLIView` functionalities.

Refactor controllers for improved error handling and modularity
Updated `PersonController` to include robust error handling for invalid age and gender inputs. Enhanced modularity by refactoring methods in `StayController` and integrating `CLIView` for user interactions. Deprecated unfinished features in `CLIController` with relevant error messages to improve user experience.

Fix bugs and improve data handling across services
Corrected logical errors in `StayController` and `PersonService` related to parameter ordering and comparisons. Enhanced `EligibilityService` and `StayService` with better restriction and assignment handling, including database integration via `RestrictionTypeDao` and new methods like `findByBedPerson` in `StayDao`. Added proper exception handling for improved robustness.

Convert application to JavaFX and fix key bugs.
Migrated the main application from CLI to JavaFX for better user experience by implementing `GuiView` and updating the main class. Fixed a critical bug in `PersonController` related to parameter ordering during person retrieval. Enhanced build files and dependencies, including JavaFX modules, PostgreSQL, and Maven plugins for JavaFX support.

Refactor to JavaFX and improve database handling.
Converted CLI to JavaFX for enhanced UI by adding FXML controllers and views. Updated database connection to use properties file and introduced modularized entity handling. Fixed minor bugs, improved structure by relocating CLI controllers, and streamlined dependency setup in `pom.xml`.

Introduced a JavaFX-based GUI with person-related fields and table view in `person_view.fxml`. Enhanced `PersonControllerFx` to handle person updates and deletions, including validation and clearing selections. Included new image assets for GUI design.

Introduced a new JavaFX GUI with FXML for managing persons, replacing the CLI interface. Added `styles/style.css` for consistent styling and improved the TableView layout to display person details. Enhanced `PersonControllerFx` to handle add, update, and delete operations with proper field bindings and validation.
